name: Food And Drink 64 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Raw.

	It is freshly ground beef,uncooked, mixed with a raw egg, chopped onions and seasoning.

questions.text: (True or False) Buttermilk has a high fat content?
What nut traditionally accompanies Swedish glogg?
questions.explanation:
Almonds.

	It is a hot punch consisting of brandy, red wine, sherry, sugar, spices and fruit pieces.

questions.text: What percentage of regular milk is water?
What calls itself the butter of margarine?
questions.explanation:
Imperial.

	Originally margarine was produced as a substitute for butter but is now a food in its own right.

questions.text: Which cheese is saltier, Brie or Camembert?
questions.explanation:
Brie.

	Both are surfaced ripened cheeses and are considered soft cheeses.

questions.text: Slivovitz is what flavor of brandy?
questions.explanation:
Plum.

	It is a colorless plum brandy made mainly in Eastern Europe.

questions.text: In the south what are butterbeans?
questions.explanation:
Lima Beans.

	They are also known as sugar beans.

questions.text: What color is the sugar beet?
questions.explanation:
White.

	The sugar beet has large white conical roots.

questions.text: What is the chief source of malt?
questions.explanation:
Barley.

	It is obtained by allowing grain to soften in water and germinate.It has a high protein and carbohydrate content.
